Event.Connection.Error.message: An error occurred while connecting to the API

Event.Connection.Ratelimited.message: Ratelimited by the API. Trying again at expiry time

State.Connecting.Description.message: Attempting to connect to the API... Please wait.

State.Ratelimited.Description.message: The API has ratelimited this client temporarily.

State.Disconnected.Description.message: Login to connect to the API.

State.ConnectionError.Description.message: Something went wrong with the API connection.

State.Unknown.Description.message: We're not sure what's going on here.

Window.Dropdown.Options.Status.Tooltip.message:
View the status page of this API instance
({0})

Window.Dropdown.Options.Support.Tooltip.message: Support the developer and API instance host

Window.Dropdown.Options.Settings.Tooltip.message: Change the settings for this plugin

Window.Dropdown.Settings.IgnoreFC.Toolti.message: Whether or not to ignore free company friend notifications

Window.Dropdown.Settings.NotificationTyp.message: The type of notification to show when a friend event occurs.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.LoginMessage.To.message:
The message to show when a friend logs in.
Use {0} to insert the friend's name.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.LogoutMessage.T.message:
The message to show when a friend logs out.
Use {0} to insert the friend's name.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.APINotification.message: Whether or not to notifications when the API connection status changes.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.FriendshipCode..message:
Your friendship code limits who you send notifications to.
You will only send and recieve notifications with people who have the same code.

Leave empty for the best experience.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.APIUrl.Tooltip.message: The URL of the API instance to connect to. Make sure you trust the host of this instance.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.APIToken.Toolti.message:
The API bearer token to use when connecting to the API.
This is used for private or protected instances and does not normally need to be set.

NEVER SET THIS TO YOUR PASSWORD.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.SaltMethod.Tool.message:
Strict: Validation is done using both Friend Code & Plugin Assembly (Users must be using the same plugin and version to exchange events)
Relaxed: Validation is only done using Friend Code (Users can exchange events from any plugin using the same API)

Keep this on strict for the best privacy and security.

Window.Dropdown.Support.FlavourText.message: You can find ways to support either the plugin developer or API host here. Any support is greatly appreciated!

Window.Dropdown.Support.Developer.Descri.message: The developer is responsible for the code that makes the Plugin and API work.

Window.Dropdown.Support.APIHost.Descript.message: The API instance host is responsible for running and maintaining the server that this plugin is connected to.

Window.Dropdown.Support.APIHost.InvalidU.message: The API instance host has provided an invalid support URL.

Window.URLUpdateNag.Text.message:
Your configured instance is recommending that you update to a new API URL; this is likely due to a change in the instance's domain name or hosting provider.

If you trust the new URL({0}), press the button below to update the API URL for next plugin load. Otherwise, you may want to find another instance provider.

Hold shift or wait {1} seconds to select an option.
